Some interesting sequences.
d1 = 27 dn+1 = dn /2 3 dn + 1 if dn even, if dn odd.
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/us/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 171 Second Street, Suite 300, San Francisco, California, 94105, USA.

a1 = 2.0 an+1 = an /2 + 1/an

b1 = 0.3 bn+1 = bn (1 − bn )

c1 = 0.3 cn+1 = 3.5 cn (1 − cn )

a1 = 2.000000000000 a2 = 1.500000000000 a3 = 1.416666666667 a4 = 1.414215686275 a5 = 1.414213562375 a6 = 1.414213562373 a7 = 1.414213562373 a8 = 1.414213562373 a9 = 1.414213562373 a10 = 1.414213562373 a11 = 1.414213562373 a12 = 1.414213562373 a13 = 1.414213562373 a14 = 1.414213562373 a15 = 1.414213562373 a16 = 1.414213562373 a17 = 1.414213562373 a18 = 1.414213562373 a19 = 1.414213562373 a20 = 1.414213562373 a21 = 1.414213562373 a22 = 1.414213562373 a23 = 1.414213562373 a24 = 1.414213562373 a25 = 1.414213562373 a26 = 1.414213562373 a27 = 1.414213562373 a28 = 1.414213562373 a29 = 1.414213562373 a30 = 1.414213562373 a31 = 1.414213562373 a32 = 1.414213562373 a33 = 1.414213562373 a34 = 1.414213562373 a35 = 1.414213562373 a36 = 1.414213562373 a37 = 1.414213562373 a38 = 1.414213562373 a39 = 1.414213562373 a40 = 1.414213562373

b1 = 0.300000000000 b2 = 0.210000000000 b3 = 0.165900000000 b4 = 0.138377190000 b5 = 0.119228943288 b6 = 0.105013402370 b7 = 0.093985587693 b8 = 0.085152296999 b9 = 0.077901383315 b10 = 0.071832757792 b11 = 0.066672812700 b12 = 0.062227548747 b13 = 0.058355280924 b14 = 0.054949942112 b15 = 0.051930445974 b16 = 0.049233674755 b17 = 0.046809720025 b18 = 0.044618570136 b19 = 0.042627753335 b20 = 0.040810627981 b21 = 0.039145120625 b22 = 0.037612780156 b23 = 0.036198058925 b24 = 0.034887759455 b25 = 0.033670603695 b26 = 0.032536894142 b27 = 0.031478244662 b28 = 0.030487364775 b29 = 0.029557885364 b30 = 0.028684216777 b31 = 0.027861432484 b32 = 0.027085173064 b33 = 0.026351566464 b34 = 0.025657161409 b35 = 0.024998871478 b36 = 0.024373927903 b37 = 0.023779839541 b38 = 0.023214358773 b39 = 0.022675452319 b40 = 0.022161276181

c1 = 0.300000000000 c2 = 0.735000000000 c3 = 0.681712500000 c4 = 0.759431985703 c5 = 0.639432656779 c6 = 0.806954869782 c7 = 0.545225477710 c8 = 0.867841296581 c9 = 0.401424731854 c10 = 0.840990207785 c11 = 0.468039873681 c12 = 0.871424926140 c13 = 0.392152334847 c14 = 0.834291083924 c15 = 0.483873149232 c16 = 0.874089736395 c17 = 0.385199041933 c18 = 0.828872590095 c19 = 0.496449868196 c20 = 0.874955887975 c21 = 0.382928287256 c22 = 0.827029749263 c23 = 0.500680400839 c24 = 0.874998379691 c25 = 0.382816753301 c26 = 0.826938303426 c27 = 0.500889710136 c28 = 0.874997229456 c29 = 0.382819772652 c30 = 0.826940780116 c31 = 0.500884042041 c32 = 0.874997264644 c33 = 0.382819680284 c34 = 0.826940704349 c35 = 0.500884215439 c36 = 0.874997263571 c37 = 0.382819683101 c38 = 0.826940706660 c39 = 0.500884210151 c40 = 0.874997263603 d1 = 27 d2 = 82 d3 = 41 d4 = 124 d5 = 62 d6 = 31 d7 = 94 d8 = 47 d9 = 142 d10 = 71 d11 = 214 d12 = 107 d13 = 322 d14 = 161 d15 = 484 d16 = 242 d17 = 121 d18 = 364 d19 = 182 d20 = 91 d21 = 274 d22 = 137 d23 = 412 d24 = 206 d25 = 103 . . . d65 = 1619 d66 = 4858 d67 = 2429 d68 = 7288 d69 = 3644 d70 = 1822 . . . d106 = 10 d107 = 5 d108 = 16 d109 = 8 d110 = 4 d111 = 2 d112 = 1
